dwin.nls

National Language Support

Windows globalization features

BUGS:
Code Page 20949 and 1147 is skipped as GetCPInfoEx fails for these code pages

See Also:
  • MSDN: National Language Support
  • MSDN: Globalization Services
  • MSDN: Code Pages
